title: Bloomberg Markets: CFRA's Zino on New Crisp, Clear iPhone
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: CFRA's Zino on New Crisp, Clear iPhone
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Angelo Zino\u0010Technology Analyst\u0010CFRA \u0010Discussing a preview on Apple product launch on Tuesday where the company plans to unveil three phones, including a premium model.
